weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Launches Rural Health Transformation Program Website Ahead of Application Window
weekly_top_story.summary: CMS released detailed information about its Rural Health Transformation Program through a new website, setting the stage for applications opening mid-September, which aims to improve rural healthcare quality and outcomes, a critical effort addressing health disparities in underserved areas.

stories.headline: 350 Healthcare Stakeholders Urge Congress to Extend Medicare Telehealth Access Before September Deadline
stories.summary: A coalition of 350 healthcare organizations called on Congress to extend Medicare telehealth access beyond its September 2025 expiration to maintain continuity of care for seniors, emphasizing telehealth as a vital lifeline especially for rural and underserved populations.
